meta.description: Optimize the number of washing machines to buy to minimize total machines while meeting washing and energy requirements.

sets.name: MACHINE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of washing machines available for purchase.

params.name: washing_capacity
params.description: Number of items each machine type can wash per day.

params.name: energy_consumption
params.description: Energy consumption in kWh per day for each machine type.

params.name: max_items_per_day
params.description: Minimum number of items that must be washed per day.

params.name: max_energy_per_day
params.description: Maximum energy available per day in kWh.

params.name: min_front_loading_machines
params.description: Minimum number of front-loading machines required.

vars.name: num_machines
vars.description: Number of machines to purchase for each type.

objective.name: min_total_machines
objective.description: Minimize the total number of washing machines purchased.

constraints.name: washing_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 5000 items can be washed per day.

constraints.name: energy_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure energy consumption does not exceed 7000 kWh per day.

constraints.name: top_loading_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: At most 40% of the machines can be top-loading.

constraints.name: min_front_loading_constraint
constraints.description: At least 10 machines should be front-loading.
